scripts.build: npm run prepare:prod && docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yaml --env-file .env build
scripts.start: npm run build && docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yaml --env-file .env up -d
scripts.stop: docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.yaml --env-file .env down && npm run remove:env
scripts.dev:start: npm run prepare:dev && docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file .env up -d
scripts.dev:stop: npm run prepare:dev && docker-compose -f infra/docker-compose.dev.yaml --env-file .env down && npm run remove:env
